article_text: With only 18 days to go until the Miss USA pageant, Univision announced it will not air the event. This is because Donald Trump — you know, the fellow who is No. 2 in Republican primary polls in New Hampshire — is a part-owner of the pageant and also made derisive comments recently about Mexico. When Trump gets a 3 a.m. phone call saying his pageant won’t be on TV, will he be ready to lead? [ TIME
